hmtx

advance

'NULL' (uni0000) (ID 1) = '0'.

'uni200D' (uni200D) (ID 7) = '0'.

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

OS/2

table version 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

static font

Name Table

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '27'
'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin'

name

MS NID 1

name

MS NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

name

MS NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31, otherwise it does not work in MS Word 2011/Mac.

NID 4 length is '32' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Thin'

Warning

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

If NID 2 is 'Regular': MS NID 4 = NID 1

NID 4 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Thin' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin'

Pass

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.000;GOOG;noto-source:20170915:90ef993387c0' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.0'.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '29' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google Inc.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

name

MS NID 11

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

NID 12 is http://www.monotype.com/studio, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Thin' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.000;GOOG;noto-source:20170915:90ef993387c0' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.0'.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '35' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtLt' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight', Everything looks good.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.monotype.com/studio, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Light' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Light Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name/head

MS NID 5

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '25'
'NotoSerifHebrew-Condensed'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-Condensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-Condensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

name

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

NID 4 length is '34' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Medium'

Warning

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '31' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google Inc.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

name

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

name

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Medium' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Med' (NID 1).

Pass

Entries are different.

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed SemiBold '

name/head

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '33' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed SemiBold ' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.'

Error

name

Entries are different.

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://scripts.sil.org/OFL'

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'

Warning

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Bold' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '29' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Bold' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond ExtBd' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '30' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack'

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Serif Hebrew Condensed Black' ≠ 'Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Blk' (NID 1).

Pass

Pass

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-100'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Noto Serif Hebrew Cond Thin Regular (NotoSerifHebrew-CondensedThin.ttf)

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'hatafsegol_zerowidthjoiner_siluqleft-hb
